There is customer who want to buy some products at the store. The total price of all the product he buys is given. He has exactly four notes with values a, b, c and d.  He wants to know if it's possible to buy products without getting any change back. In other words, he wants to pay the exact price of a products using combination of notes he has. Output "YES" if it is possible or "NO" if it is not, For example :
Total price=20
a=5
b=20
c=10
d=50 
Output:- YES
customer uses note having value b


Input
Input will begin with an integer T, the number of test cases. Each test case start with the total price followed by  the value of a,b,c and d in each line.

-values of a,b,c, and price are between 1 to 10000 inclusive.
-1 ≤ T ≤ 30


Output
For every test, output a single line containing "YES" if it is possible or "NO" if it is not .


Example

Input:
2
20
5
20
10
50
65
25
79
59
63

Output:
YES
NO
